sentence: Stepan Company ( SCL ) will begin trading ex-dividend on August 29, 2016.
A cash dividend payment of $0.19 per share is scheduled to be paid on September 15, 2016.
Shareholders who purchased SCL prior to the ex-dividend date are eligible for the cash dividend payment.
This marks the 4th quarter that SCL has paid the same dividend.
At the current stock price of $70.61, the dividend yield is 1.08%.
The previous trading day's last sale of SCL was $70.61, representing a -1.01% decrease from the 52 week high of $71.33 and a 74.39% increase over the 52 week low of $40.49.
SCL is a part of the Basic Industries sector, which includes companies such as Procter & Gamble Company ( PG ) and Unilever PLC ( UL ).
SCL's current earnings per share, an indicator of a company's profitability, is $4.07.
Zacks Investment Research reports SCL's forecasted earnings growth in 2016 as 24.28%, compared to an industry average of 9.3%.
For more information on the declaration, record and payment dates, visit the SCL Dividend History page.
Our Dividend Calendar has the full list of stocks that have an ex-dividend today.
